Package org.apache.tamaya.spi

Class ConversionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.spi.ConversionContext
  • public class ConversionContext
extends Object
    A conversion context containing all the required values for implementing conversion. Use the included #Builder for creating new instances of. This class is thread-safe to use. Adding supported formats is synchronized.
    See Also:
    PropertyConverter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Builder to create new instances of ConversionContext.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public String getKey()
        Get the key accessed. This information is very useful to evaluate additional metadata needed to determine/ control further aspects of the conversion.
        Returns:
        the key. This may be null in case where a default value has to be converted and no unique underlying key/value configuration is present.

      • getValues

        public List<PropertyValue> getValues()
        Get the correspnoding underlying property values matching the given key, in order of significance (most significant last).
        Returns:
        the underlying values evaluated, never null.

      • getTargetType

        public TypeLiteral<?> getTargetType()
        Get the target type required.
        Returns:
        the target type required.

      • getAnnotatedElement

        public AnnotatedElement getAnnotatedElement()
        Get the annotated element, if conversion is performed using injection mechanisms.
        Returns:
        the annotated element, or null.

      • getConfiguration

        public Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the configuration, which is targeted.
        Returns:
        the configuration instance, or null.

      • getMeta

        public Map<String,​String> getMeta()
        Evaluate the metadata for the current target key from the given values. Later values hereby are more significant.
        Returns:
        the evaluated meta data mapProperties.

      • addSupportedFormats

        public void addSupportedFormats​(Class<?> converterType,
                                String... formatDescriptors)
        Allows to addPropertyValue information on the supported/tried formats, which can be shown to the user, especially when conversion failed. Adding of formats is synchronized, all formats are added in order to the overall createList. This means formats should be passed in order of precedence.
        Parameters:
        converterType - the converters, which implements the formats provided.
        formatDescriptors - the format descriptions in a human readable form, e.g. as regular expressions.

      • getSupportedFormats

        public List<String> getSupportedFormats()
        Get the supported/tried formats in precedence order. The contents of this method depends on the PropertyConverter instances involved in a conversion.
        Returns:
        the supported/tried formats, never null.

      • toBuilder

        public ConversionContext.Builder toBuilder()
        Creates a builder based on this instance.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getConfigurationContext

        @Deprecated
public ConfigurationContext getConfigurationContext()
        Deprecated.
        Use getConfiguration() and Configuration.getContext().
        Get the current configuration context.
        Returns:
        the current configuration context.
